name: みんなの節電度指数
summary:
『みんなの節電度指数』は、東京電力エリア内の電力供給量と現在の使用量がどれくらいかチェックできるアプリ。電気使用状況に応じて3種類のステータスとメッセージがキャラクターアイコン付きで表示される。
--
You can check the amount of an electric supply and the electric power used.
"Electric Saving" So, how much the current usage of electricity supply in the area and the Tokyo Electric Power
You can check the data to take advantage of the Electric Power Company.
Kyarakutaaikon with messages displayed in the following three status and use of electricity, depending on the situation,
We call the power savings to the user.
1.80 ~ 90% electricity usage
Electricity supply will display a message that asks for help save power but stable Hikitsudzuki
2.90 ~ 95% electricity usage
Displays a message that asks for help save power Kita Tame increasing electricity supply.
3.95% or more electricity usage
Displays a strong message that asks for help save power for the electricity supply has been strained.
